abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column on New York Jets wide receiver Plaxico Burress' performance in team's victory over San Diego Charges; notes that Burress caught three touchdown passes during the game, rescuing the Jets and coach Rex Ryan from humiliation.
snippet: Plaxico Burress scored three touchdowns in a comeback victory against the Chargers, his first truly impressive performance of the season.
lead_paragraph: Plaxico Burress scored three touchdowns in a comeback victory against the Chargers, his first truly impressive performance of the season.

headline.main: Redemption Is in Burress’s Sizable Reach
headline.print_headline: Redemption Is in Burress’s Sizable Reach
headline.seo: Burress Finds Redemption Within His Sizable Reach
